mapper.select: select roleid, rolename, rolecode, roledescribe from sys_role order by updatetime desc
select roleid, rolename, rolecode, roledescribe from sys_role where roleid=#{roleid}
select rolecode from sys_role a where rolecode=#{rolecode} and a.roleid<>#{roleid}
select rolecode from sys_role a where exists (select 1 from sys_user_role s where s.roleid=#{roleid} and s.roleid=a.roleid)
mapper.delete: delete s.* from sys_role s where s.roleid=#{roleid}
mapper.select: select permissionid id , permname name , parentid pid, 'true' checked from sys_permission a where a.enabled='1' order by sortnum
mapper.delete: delete t.* from sys_role_permission t where t.roleid=#{roleid}
